title: Dodging queues (for good reason)
body:
I've dodged 2 games today because someone didn't listen to calls for roles and got a fifteen minute ban.
I feel it's unfair.
Can I get it repealed? Like, let's just say theoretically, you call supp and go Thresh and 3 others call adc, mid, and jungle so you lock in, then in the last 2 seconds the 4th guy locks in Morgana support, am I warranted to dodge that game to make sure the next 20 minutes of my life isn't hell?

replies.body: Sounds like you were playing normals. In which case no one really cares. It's normals, play whatever and do whatever.
Dodging is against the rules, it's really that simple. If you dodge, accept the consequences.
